1.content:
"Have you found a place yet Adam?" Your mom asked.

You slid down from your room to join her at the breakfast nook. "Kinda. A few ladies from the classifieds answered my calls. I'm going today to go check them out."

"Let me see." She gestured, seeing the paper in your hands.

"Why?"

"Because I want to know more about who you'll be moving into that's why." Your mother shot back. "Besides, is it so wrong for me to be worried who you'll be in. This will be your first apartment after all. I just hate the idea of you going up some strange woman's ass that I don't know. We have a perfectly good guest house you can move into by the way."

You roll your eyes. "Mom. She's too small. In any case, it's going to be okay. Plus it's not like I won't come back and visit you."

"I know." She mopes, "It's just these walls won't be the same without you in them.

Greta, now 58 years old, had been you and your mom's home for the past 13 years. Your had mom won the single mother in a lawsuit. The way it happened was Greta's daughter, Emma, had unknowingly sat on your father at a dinner, murdering him by suffocation under her heavy diaper. Normally a tiny person has no trouble at all living and breathing under a regular sized person. However, in this case the autopsy report stated your father had choked on a piece of food logged in his throat when he was sat on by the baby and was unable to call for help.

With his death being ruled a negligent homicide by the little girl she was going to be taken by the state to be raised as a civil servant to the little community. This meant she would've grown up confined inside one of the number of miniature towns having to perform various tasks and services as a public worker for the city and its citizens. Many such women are sentenced in this manner for doing a myriad of crimes and quite often have to serve lifetime terms with no parole. In order to keep her daughter from suffering this fate Greta accepted the plea deal for her and her daughter to be your families properties.

You remember being five and moving into your new home. While Greta was a mansion her two year old little girl was like a broom closet. Nevertheless her soft chubby cheeks made an excellent bed to sleep in as y'all grew up together. It made you blush how recently Emma had been introducing you to everyone as her butt's boyfriend. With how much time you'd been spending with her it might as well have been true. Especially after your mom and Greta agreed her butt and you made a cute couple.

You knew you'd inherit them both one day but you wanted to live out on your own for a while first.

"I promise mom. You'll see me all the time. I won't be worlds away." I comforted her.

"Only a couple of moons." Came a booming voice from outside.

Suddenly the hallway beneath you disappeared. In its place a blinding light came shining into the kitchen. After a few moments the grinning chunky face of a freckled redhead came into view. Her cat-like green eyes instantly mesmerizing you. You knew her instinctively to be Emma. You also saw her palm next to the opening. Her red painted sharp fingernails acting as a step-stool to her chubby fingers.

"Ready to go owner?" She asked.

"In a minute." I answer.

She gets an annoyed look, "Hurry up. I don't like havin my face this close to mom's butt. You know how gassy she gets in her sleep."

"But that's the best thing about living here hun." Mom playfully chides her, "You'd do well to learn from your mom's example. She eats lots of fattening foods, especially burritos, that put more junk on her truck. You can stand to put on some pounds in that department. Maybe then my son won't have to look for a thicker woman to move into."

Emma's face now looked a mix between being disgusted and insulted. It was simply too cute for you not to chuckle a bit. You knew she wanted to strangle your mom but being her owner she knew all she could do was sit there and take it.

You turned giving your mom a kiss goodbye before crawling out Greta's anus onto Emma's hand. Soon as you were there she let her mother's cheeks slam shut before smacking them hard. This caused Greta to let loose a massive fart. The aroma of which filling up the whole room almost immediately.

"Emma!" You mom screamed.

"What? Thought you said you loved my mom's farts? Ha Ha!" She quipped.

You facepalmed, "Let's just get going already Emma."

"Sure thing owner." She winked, "Your girlfriend would love to walk with you to your first apartment viewing."

"That's not wha..." You began before her thumb interrupted you.

Pulling the back of her leggings open she brought you around. You saw her massive ass cheeks directly below you. Though not a SSBBW yet she was well on her way to being one. At 393lbs at her last weighing she was definitely a contender for you to have as your own home someday. It helped her appeal she hardly showered or wiped like most tinies demanded so at least she had the proper house mindset.

Releasing her hold you fell face first into her crack. The speed at which you fell allowed you to slide deep down into it. You managed during this descent to reorient yourself going feet first down. Last thing you wanted was to be upside down and lose consciousness inside her ass again. The memory of being shocked back awake in the cold toilet water made you cringe.

Once you came to a stop to what you figured was close to her back door opening you felt the snap of her leggings push you forward against it. The pressure from all sides caused you to be stuck. Unable to move you had no choice but to allow your property to maneuver you around like she was fixing a wedgie. Try as you might against her finger you wound up having your face right in the middle of her sphincter.

Satisfied her owner was in his proper place with his girlfriend, Emma checked her cell to see which apartment she had to walk them too first. She saw she had plenty of time to get to the first one. Emma decided this would be a perfect time to take a leisurely stroll through the park to give her owner and his girlfriend quality time together. Plus, she could read a bit about the apartments he's looking into.

Emma skimmed the bios of each before clicking on what they said in their ads.

------

Britney Nicole Penderson. A fourteen year old girl suffering from irritable bowl syndrome seeking a permanent resident. At 567lbs 4'9" she lives with her mom, dad, and twin baby siblings (boy and girl both 7). Her hobbies include school band, going to the movies, hanging out with her friends, and of course eating.

Mrs. Jasmine Francesca. A 37 year old black woman from southern Louisiana. Recently married and looking to rent out her rectum while she and her husband try for a baby. At a whopping 690lbs, 5'11", she guarantees renter will have plenty of space and fun. Her hobbies include talking on the phone, watching soaps, and having lots of sex with her new husband.

Maria Isabella Ripol Lopez is 515lbs, 5'2", yet most of that weight is in her hips. A motel maid by profession she is seeking a renter to ease the burn caused by her cheeks rubbing together all day. A single mother of eight children by multiple fathers from the mexican gang she really needs a real man who can tame her sassy ass into submission. Her hobbies include cooking, shopping, dancing, and going out on dates.

Tia Liu Carrere. A mixed child of Korean and Chinese descent she was raised in Hawaii where she learned all the native hip swaying dances. Though having amassed a solid 821lbs at 6'3 she is no less active than her class peers. A tom-boy by default she loves sports, drinking, partying, and is extremely sarcastic to the point of humiliating and bullying everyone smaller than her. On route to graduating college at only 26 years old she is seeking a man to live in her ass to help pay off some of her tuition.

Priya Velamma. A married Indian woman from Bangladesh carrying a surrogate child for a rich white family. At only three months pregnant the nineteen year old 5'7" mother-to-be has already reached 741lbs. She is seeking an anal renter to assist during her first few pregnancies. Her hobbies include pottery, singing, walking, and making love to her husband.

------

Emma sat on the park bench. She felt you, her owner, feebly trying to wiggle free from out under her. She could vaguely hear your voice saying something. Instead of trying to find out what it was you were trying to tell her she put in her headphones and cranked up her tunes.

With her attention back on the list she clicked on ________ for more details.
1.title: Moving out

choices: Convince you to live in her.
11.content:
Emma clicked on the pre-teen's profile.

Hi. My name's Heather Penderson. I'm placing this ad on behalf of my daughter Britney. She's fourteen and fast growing into a SSBBW. I'm looking for an understanding man, or woman, to, for lack of a better phrase, be her permanent suppository as she transitions into womanhood. Yes, I know this basically means I'm looking for someone to buy my sweet angel. I would never do this except this is the only way our doctors say she'll get the care and treatment she needs. Britney isn't trained yet to be someones home but her father and I will assist in that area if you wish. Thank you for your consideration.

Emma felt a ting of sympathy for them after reading the heartfelt message from the mother. She felt torn now about wanting to keep you for herself and seeing you move into that girls ass. Emma understood why her owner would want to meet them though. She couldn't blame you.

Emma went back a page to see who else was available before deciding on where to go. There were a couple of amazing prospects she knew you'd enjoy moving into. Even one mischievous option to drop you off at a woman's prison facility. In the end she decided too...
11.title: SSBBW White woman Britney

choices: Convince you to live in her.
12.content:
Emma read the details of the lease agreement.

SSBBW seeking renter for my asshole. Used regularly by my husbands cock so expect occasional roommate. CHA provided when I'm gassy. Must rent as-is but renter is responsible for upkeep and improve while in residence. Cleaning supplies not provided. Renter may only use supplies on hand only. First, last, and security deposit none-refundable. No exceptions. $550 monthly, $500 deposit, $1,000 security and $100 Application due up front. None-negotiable. No keys necessary. Access in and out of my rectum by begging me. No complaining tolerated once in my ass about anything. This includes condition of my ass, what I do while you're in there, or when my husband's cock pays a visit while you're there. Not responsible for your injuries, getting squished, soaked, crushed, drowned, suffocated, accidentally flushed down toilet, losing you, or any act that leads to your death. Absolutely no pets allowed. No more than two guests with an hour notice to notify me beforehand. No smoking or drinking alcohol permitted in my ass. Rent due first of month. Period. Late gets you fed to my cat. Serious inquiries only.

She couldn't believe this bossy lady was one you circled. Emma knew you loved dominant women but this was ridiculous. Renting the ass of a married black woman trying to get pregnant that'll treat her owner as nothing more than a living dildo slave? Sure, Emma liked teasing you but never in a million years would she out right abuse you. She couldn't do that. She cared for you too much.

But learning that you liked to be...

No! Emma decided. She would do as you desired and hope you would come back to her. After all, she reasoned, she was your property. She was yours forever. No matter what.

Emma crossed her legs. Feeling you squeeze tighter into her ass crack she smiled triumphantly. She would do what's in her owners best interest whether he liked it or not. If that meant taking you to this woman you wanted to live in or simply making her owner see she's the best place he could ever live in then so be it. There were other back SSBBW she could choose from too from the previous page.

Whatever choice she made Emma knew it would make her Master happy.
12.title: SSBBW Black Woman Francesca

info.brief_description: In an alternate reality SSBBW asses have become the preferred homes of shrunken people.
info.description:
As stated, in an alternate reality, very close to that of the movie Downsizing, SSBBW asses have become the preferred homes of shrunken people.

SSBBW often sell themselves to tiny people. Single and entire family units live inside and around SSBBW asses. Other SSBBW rent their butts out to the dowmsized people, acting as landladies.

There are initially 5 SSBBW's to choose from. After the initial chapter for each lovely lady a option for other SSBBW's for readers to add will appear.

RULES:

No dead ends. This interactive story revolves around tinies living and thriving inside and around SSBBW asses. Death of tinies are allowed so long as 1. main characters and his family don't die and 2. Storylines with any SSBBW don't end even if their tiny riders do.

Each SSBBW lady weighs no less than 500lbs, aside from Emma, yet no bigger than 1,000lbs. This is so she can be able to move around a bit if only to let tinies in and out of her butt.

Full paragraph minimum per chapter.

This is a SSBBW butt story. Not feet, not vore, not hand crush. Those can be used but keep in mind theme of story. Scat, anal vore, cuckolding, incest, everything butt allowed.

Always have the 'Someone' or 'Something' else option.

Gift points given if chapters are good and stay on theme. Thank you have fun. :)

P. S. If any SSBBW's out there wants a permanent and devoted ass worshiping slave please hit me up. ;)
